title: Alesha Dixon sparks rumours she’s had second baby after being spotted for AGT
text:
Alesha Dixon is believed to have given birth (Picture: TheImageDirect/Rex)

Alesha Dixon has sparked rumours she’s given birth to her second child after being spotted filming for America’s Got Talent.

The 40-year-old singer was snapped on the way to America’s Got Talent auditions in LA, where she was seen wearing a crop top and holding a denim jacket.

While there’s been no confirmation on the new arrival, the picture has sparked claims she’s had the baby already with backing dancer boyfriend Azuka Ononye.

Metro.co.uk has reached out to Alesha’s reps for comment.

Alesha Dixon has taken over Mel B’s spot on the panel (Picture: TheImageDirect.com)

The pair have been dating since 2012 and it’s believed they married in secret in 2017, although this has never been confirmed.

They welcomed their first child together, five-year-old daughter Azura Sienna Ononye, in October 2013.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Alesha revealed she was expecting her second child during the semi-finals of Britain’s Got Talent, after Ant and Dec previously made the pregnancy announcement in a musical number.

Azuka Ononye and Alesha Dixon (Picture: David M. Benett/Dave Benett/Getty Images)

As the audience cheered with congratulations, Alesha said she was ‘over the moon’ with the happy news.

Alesha was announced as Mel B’s replacement on America’s Got Talent last month, joining Heidi Klum, Howie Mandel, and Simon Cowell

MORE: BGT comedian Jack Carroll jokes that Alesha Dixon’s had Botox and fans think she was furious
description: Alesha Dixon has been pictured on the way to filming for America's Got Talent, with rumours abound she's given birth.
